name: download_airports
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool priceline_com_provider.
Tool description: priceline.com | Lets you search hotels, cars for rent, flights. **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other travel  api:** https://rapi.one
API description: Downloads a list of airports with IATA codes for flight search from the Priceline API.

resume_key.description: An optional key to resume results from a given ID. Defaults to None.

limit.description: Limits the number of results from the response. Defaults to 500.
